import { Nav } from "./components/Nav" import { Header } from "./components/Header" import { AboutUs } from "./components/AboutUs" import styled from "styled-components" import { Structure } from "./components/Structure" import { Contact } from "./components/Contact" import { Footer } from "./components/Footer" import { structureItems } from "./data" import { Certifications } from "./components/Certifications" function App() { const navOptions = [ "Home", "Quem somos", "Estrutura", "Certificações ambientais", "Contato", ] const BodyWrapper = styled.div` padding: 0 25rem; ` const onNavClick = (option: string) => { const anchor = document.querySelector(`#${option}`) anchor?.scrollIntoView({ behavior: "smooth", block: 'end'}) } return (
) } export default App
